original_text: Joshua heard the noise of the Israelites as they were shouting down below. He said to Moses, ‘I can hear the sound of war in the camp!’
korean_text: 여호수아가 백성들의 요란한 소리를 듣고 모세에게 말하되 진중에서 싸우는 소리가 나나이다

sentences.original_text: Joshua heard the noise of the Israelites
as they were shouting down below
'I can hear the sound of war
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 전쟁의 소리를 들을 수 있어요
